Uses of Interface
io.sarl.lang.core.AgentContext

  • Packages that use AgentContext 
    Package Description
    io.sarl.core  

    • Uses of AgentContext in io.sarl.core

      Methods in io.sarl.core that return AgentContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AgentContext ExternalContextAccess.getContext(UUID contextID)
      Replies the AgentContext for the given ID.
      AgentContext DefaultContextInteractions.getDefaultContext()
      Returns the Default context fo the agent.
      AgentContext InnerContextAccess.getInnerContext()
      Replies the inner context.
      Methods in io.sarl.core that return types with arguments of type AgentContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SynchronizedCollection<AgentContext> ExternalContextAccess.getAllContexts()
      Replies all contexts this agent is a member of, including the default context.
      Methods in io.sarl.core with parameters of type AgentContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean DefaultContextInteractions.isDefaultContext(AgentContext context)
      Replies if the given context is the default context.
      UUID Lifecycle.spawnInContext(Class<? extends Agent> agentClass, AgentContext context, Object... params)
      Spawns a new member agent in the parent's context (parentID).
      UUID Lifecycle.spawnInContextWithID(Class<? extends Agent> agentClass, UUID agentID, AgentContext context, Object... params)
      Spawns a new member agent in the parent's context (parentID).
